body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Movie Magic Customer Support. My name is Alan Howard and I'm here to assist you. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Shirley. Before we proceed, could you please provide me with your email address and phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is s.long@example.com and my phone number is five five five dash one two three dash four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Shirley. I have noted your information. How can I assist you today? Do you have any questions or concerns regarding Movie Magic's services?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I have a couple of questions. How do I return a movie if I rented it online? Also, what genres of movies do you offer in your catalog?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: To return a movie rented online, you can simply drop it off at any of our physical locations or use our prepaid return shipping label. As for movie genres, we offer a wide range including action, comedy, drama, and more. Is there anything else you would like to know, Shirley?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's helpful, thank you. I think that covers it for now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Shirley. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Thank you for your time and have a great day!
